tool.name: SAGA.ta_channels.1
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayELEVATION False isArrayCHANNELS False isArraySINKROUTE False output_data_BASINS $output_data_BASINS name SAGA.ta_channels.1 ELEVATION $ELEVATION CHANNELS $CHANNELS SINKROUTE $SINKROUTE MINSIZE $MINSIZE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_BASINS $OutputSection_BASINS.outputType_BASINS transmissionMode_BASINS $OutputSection_BASINS.transmissionMode_BASINS

param.name: ELEVATION
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: CHANNELS
param.label: Channel Network
param.help: Channel Network The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: SINKROUTE
param.label: Sink Route
param.help: Sink Route The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_BASINS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format and the output value
